name: Hell YEAH
description:
You are trapped in hell and as the lava rises you need to ascend to freedom, right there where your evil demon-face belongs.

Use the unholy dash-spheres to dash - hell yeah!

How to play: 

- A/D or arrow keys to move
- Space to jump/double jump and to dash

Music: 
Azureflux - The Precession of the Equinoxes in the Inverted Alps
Background-images:
- AlizabethNova
- WhyPeopleRage
